comment: Absolutely stunning property! The modern design and attention to detail are exceptional. The location is perfect for city living, and the building amenities exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend!
Great property overall. The space is well-designed and the neighborhood is fantastic. Only minor issue was the parking situation, but everything else was perfect.
I've been living here for 3 months now and couldn't be happier. The building management is responsive, neighbors are friendly, and the location is unbeatable. Worth every penny!
Beautiful property with excellent amenities. The gym and pool are top-notch. The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the occasional noise from the street, but it's manageable.
This place exceeded all my expectations. The natural light, modern finishes, and smart home features make it feel like a luxury hotel. The concierge service is also incredibly helpful.
Charming Victorian with so much character! The restoration work is impeccable, and the modern updates blend seamlessly with the historic features. The garden is a peaceful oasis.
Love the historic charm and the neighborhood is absolutely gorgeous. The only downside is the heating system can be a bit finicky in winter, but the character of the place makes up for it.
This Victorian gem is absolutely worth it. The craftsmanship in the woodwork and original features is stunning. The location is perfect for walking to cafes and shops.
Beautiful property with lots of character. The high ceilings and original fireplaces are amazing. Storage could be better, but that's typical for historic homes.
Simply perfect! Every detail has been thoughtfully restored. The kitchen renovation is particularly impressive - modern functionality while maintaining period charm.
The penthouse views are absolutely breathtaking! Waking up to the city skyline every morning never gets old. The rooftop terrace is perfect for entertaining.
Stunning property with incredible views. The floor-to-ceiling windows are amazing. Premium price but the quality and location justify it. Wind can be strong on the terrace though.
Living in this penthouse is like a dream. The smart home integration is seamless, the chef's kitchen is incredible, and the primary suite is pure luxury. Can't recommend enough!
This is luxury living at its finest. Every finish is high-end, the building amenities are exceptional, and the concierge service is outstanding. The sunset views from the terrace are unmatched.

Spectacular penthouse with amazing attention to detail. The space is beautifully designed and the views are incredible. Only giving 4 stars because the elevator wait times can be long during peak hours.
